TH:Strongbox.NAME: Strongbox
TH:Strongbox.FLAVOR: Keeps your treasures safe and sound.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] whenever you play a treasure.

TH:HealthInsurance.NAME: Health Insurance
DESCRIPTIONS: When you start your turn bloodied, heal 1 HP and lose 1 gold per treasure.

TH:PirateNurse.NAME: Pirate Nurse
TH:PirateNurse.FLAVOR: I'll keep you alive - for a price.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you start your turn bloodied, heal 1 HP and lose 1 gold per treasure.

TH:Anvil.NAME: Anvil
TH:Anvil.FLAVOR: Makes your precious things even more precious.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a treasure to your deck, upgrade it.

TH:Rum.NAME: Rum
TH:Rum.FLAVOR: Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a treasure, heal 1 HP and reduce weak, frail and vulnerable by 1.

TH:Parrot.NAME: Parrot
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a treasure, draw a card.

TH:GoldenGun.NAME: Golden Gun
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a treasure, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

TH:BlackFlag.NAME: Black Flag
TH:BlackFlag.FLAVOR: Take what you can, give nothing back!
DESCRIPTIONS: Normal fights have a 50% chance to award treasures. Raises treasure cap to 25.

TH:CursedGold.NAME: Cursed Gold
TH:CursedGold.FLAVOR: My sympathies, friend. You've no manner of luck at all.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a treasure, apply vulnerable to everyone. When you play a treasure, gain !M! gold.
